I was using v3.25 which had a patch that worked fine. I'm using 7 64bit and after I installed it will not let me open the program to enter serial without rebooting first. Instructions say don't reboot and enter serial. Also what is the host file to edit? It doesn't say.
I did reboot and entered serial and it is now Pro version but I don't know if it will stay that way.

Uploader please help:

I guess i should have edited the host file to stop it from updating itself. Now I uninstalled it using RevoUninstaller pro and reinstalled but it doesnt work at all. I tried this many times but failed. 
what can I do now in order to make it work?
